TITLE: Cross Sectional Content
DEF: Content that is a part of any educational and scholarly activity in addition to its domain-specific material
TASK: The Cross-Sectional Content pattern integrates diverse perspectives, themes, or concepts to promote holistic understanding. The pattern aims to overcome subject silos and foster interdisciplinary thinking. To achieve this, educators should identify meaningful intersections between subjects, design engaging activities, and guide learners in drawing connections.
